name: Dizzying Swing
description: Slam an enemy with an upward swing, dealing 2760 Physical Damage and setting them Off Balance for 7 seconds.    Hitting an enemy that is already Off Balance stuns them for 2 seconds.  Targets that are immune to Off Balance are snared by 40% for 2 seconds.
effectLines: Also sets the enemy Off Balance.  Hitting Off Balance enemies stuns them.  Enemies that are immune to Off Balance are snared.
coefDescription: Slam an enemy with an upward swing, dealing $1 Physical Damage and setting them Off Balance for 7 seconds.    Hitting an enemy that is already Off Balance stuns them for 2 seconds.  Targets that are immune to Off Balance are snared by 40% for 2 seconds.
rawDescription:
Slam an enemy with an upward swing, dealing <<1>> and setting them Off Balance for <<2>>. 

Hitting an enemy that is already Off Balance stuns them for <<3>>.

Targets that are immune to Off Balance are snared by <<4>> for <<5>>.
